subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: The official first day of Camp Santana bore witness to fans scampering about the complex, straining to catch a glimpse of the ace who in some minds has already won the 2008 Cy Young award.
snippet: The official first day of Camp Santana bore witness to fans scampering about the complex, straining to catch a glimpse of the ace who in some minds has already won the 2008 Cy Young award.
